system.requirements: Tier 3: Astropath E.Adv, Strong Minded, Willpower 50. Aptitudes: Defence, Willpower
system.effect: Astropath can re-roll Willpower tests they make due to results of Psychic Phenomena, and Perils of the Warp, as well as tests to avoid gaining Mutations, or to resist Daemonic Possession.

description.value: Astropath can re-roll Willpower tests they make due to results of Psychic Phenomena, and Perils of the Warp, as well as tests to avoid gaining Mutations, or to resist Daemonic Possession.
